title: Bloomberg's Waral on Facebook: Ad Metrics Tough to Beat (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Jitendra Waral, Global Internet and Consumer Electronics Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on Facebook earnings.
